org.gephi.tools.spi

Interface ToolEventListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MouseClickEventListener, NodeClickEventListener, NodePressAndDraggingEventListener, NodePressingEventListener

    public interface ToolEventListener
    Listeners used by Tool classes for receiving events from the visualization window like mouse click, mouse drag, node click etc.

    A tool can declare multiple listeners and hence build more complex user interactions scenario.

    Author:
    Mathieu Bastian
